tool.name: ExportImg2AssetbyObj
tool.displayname: Export Image or Image Collection to Earth Engine Asset by Serialized Object

param.name: ee_obj
param.displayname: Select the JSON file of the serialized object
param.dialogReference: The serialized Google Earth Engine object in JSON format. Browse and select the target JSON file to load.

param.name: data_type
param.displayname: Choose the type of the serialized object
param.dialogReference: Select either Image or Image Collection. If Image Collection is chosen, the script will export each image in the collection individually.

param.name: bands
param.displayname: Select the bands to be exported
param.dialogReference: Select the bands to export. If not selected, all bands will be exported.

param.name: asset_id
param.dialogReference: Specify the asset ID for the exported dataset within your asset folder. The asset ID must begin with projects/YOUR_PROJECT_ID/assets/, followed by any additional path you wish to include.

param.name: description
param.dialogReference: This string is used as the task name for each export. For image collections, the image ID is appended to the description to ensure each export task name is unique.

param.name: pyramiding_policy
param.dialogReference: The pyramiding policy to apply to each band in the image, keyed by band name. Values must be one of: mean, sample, min, max, or mode. Defaults to "mean". A special key, ".default" may be used to change the default for all bands.

param.name: dimensions
param.dialogReference: The dimensions to use for the exported image. Takes either a single positive integer as the maximum dimension or "WIDTHxHEIGHT" where WIDTH and HEIGHT are each positive integers.

param.name: region
param.dialogReference: Choose between using the current map extent and specifying a polygon feature layer.

param.name: polygon_layer
param.dialogReference: Specify the polygon layer if you choose polygon as region of interest.

param.name: scale
param.dialogReference: Resolution in meters per pixel. Defaults to 1000.

param.name: max_pixels
param.dialogReference: Restrict the number of pixels in the export. By default, you will see an error if the export exceeds 1e8 pixels. Setting this value explicitly allows one to raise or lower this limit.

param.name: shard_size
param.dialogReference: Size in pixels of the tiles in which this image will be computed. Defaults to 256.

param.name: priority
param.dialogReference: The priority of the task within the project. Higher priority tasks are scheduled sooner. Must be an integer between 0 and 9999. Defaults to 100.

tool.summary: This script exports the serialized JSON object of an image or image collection to an Earth Engine asset. It is intended for cases where the user has applied filters, mapping, or reduction operations and wants to save the processed dataset to avoid repeated computation.

idCitation.resTitle: Export Image or Image Collection to Earth Engine Asset by Serialized Object
